snippet.title: Worlds Adrift - New Island Journey Trailer
snippet.description:
Worlds Adrift is the upcoming massively multiplayer game from Bossa Studios, the creators of Surgeon Simulator and I am Bread, that frees players from the shackles of regular MMO games.

Watch a crew explore some of the new mysterious islands of Worlds Adrift. All islands featured in this trailer were created by the community.

Design your own island and it could appear in the final game for thousands of players to discover.
Download the free Island Creator at http://store.steampowered.com/app/271920/

Don't feel like creating an island? Use the free Island Creator to explore and swing through more than 1,000 community-created islands and rate your favourites.
